website_summaries.verdict: This face and body lotion offers a terrific option to moisturize damaged skin.
pros: Delivers a superb treatment for dry skin on the elbows and knees
Olive flavor provides the green tea lotion with a light, airy scent
Equipped with rich emollients that help make the skin vibrant and attractive
More affordable than many comparable green tea lotions
cons: May cause an allergic reaction following initial use

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky, not heavily scented, makes your skin glow and the bottle lasts a long time.....
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product at my nail salon and had the urge to find it and buy it for myself at home. I've tried every product sold at retail stores and the best one out there is Lubriberm.....but Codi products are definitely BETTER. When applying the lotion you can feel the moisture as you lather it into your skin. It's not sticky, not heavily scented, makes your skin glow and the bottle lasts a long time. Since I live in the desert, I use lotion daily and love it!!! I will continue to purchase from Amazon as long as it's sold on here:-)
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and I love the smell of this and it has made my dry kneecaps almost normal again. I decided to try Green Tea because I just switched to Green tea body wash and shampoo and this mixes with those really well without an overpowering smell. Although if you are prone to acne I would make sure you wash your hands before you touch your face. Like most body lotions they are aren't for sensitive skin like your face.
customer_reviews.author: bluewolf37

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Lotion/Cross Between Lotion & Cream
customer_reviews.text: The gal who does my nails introduced me to this wonderful lotion. What a delightfully rich lotion. It’s really a cross between a lotion & a cream. Both the green tea & mandarin orange scents The green tea fragrance is very light while the mandarin orange is stronger. Both are fantastic. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meier

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff ! It smells good and you only need a little bit to moisturize your body. 🥰 My friend used it one time & said yeah.. my birthday is coming up lol. So I ended up gifting her a set. My mother also uses it ! This stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.author: inspiredbykie

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but so worth it. I fell in like with this lotion at my local posh nail salon. So I just had to have a few bottles for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Love

customer_reviews.title: Seems good?
customer_reviews.text: Seems good, but it’s hard to review any healthcare products. I like that this is a green tea lotion. It goes on smooth and smells nice. Is it better than other lotions? I don’t really know.
customer_reviews.author: Ancora Imparo

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. My nail salon uses it and I was forced to buy it. Got the two pack, it will last for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: They got the bottle, the label just not the lotion
customer_reviews.text: My sister buys his bottle all the time from the store. When I saw it online I thought I would be getting a nice deal, but the scent is completely wrong. It smells like old lotion that's been marinating for years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion ever, no joke
customer_reviews.text: I went through an entire bottle of this and I can say this is a great formula, so great that I repurchased and got a 2 pack that will probably last me for the next 2 years...but I’m not complaining. Everyone compliments the soft scent. The olive codi lotion and green tea lotion are equally recommended. I use this pretty much for everything— after I shave, to massage, to moisturize my hands, literally anything.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kirik

customer_reviews.title: Very good lotion. Doesn’t clog my pores.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I found this lotion. It is non-comedogenic ( doesn’t clog pores). I use it generously.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Gia

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but not too strong. Lasts long. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this lotion at my nail salon . Smelled so good I looked online for it. It is not greasy and really smells great without being perfumy. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seller. Received the product sooner that anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Received the product sooner that anticipated. The price and free shipping was also a great deal. Thank you selltop15. : ) Great lotion! Smells like green tea, i.e. fresh and clean, and is hydrating. Not too thick and not oily and absorbs quickly. I recommend this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent daily moisturizer for your body. I got first introduced to hand and body lotion at my nail salon. It has a pleasant soft scent, and I love the pump. You can quickly moisturize and put your clothes on within 5 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sent and moisturizer!!!

My family members would use my lotion when they were out of their own product and then requested that I purchase their own bottles of Codi Green Tea lotion. It’s drfi a staple in my household.

customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer. Light scent does not bother my allergies. I use it daily.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and it's not greasy

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Hands!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many other reviewers, found this lotion through my nail technician. I'm a Master Gardner so my hands were always wrecked....this stuff has saved them. I try to use it every time after washing/drying my hands. Seems to absorb better this way vs on dry hands. Also I've noticed that the brand name can vary, here on Amazon, but the bottle and label are always basically the same.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: it smells amazing - not over powering
customer_reviews.text: My co-worker had me try this hand and body lotion and I HAD TO HAVE IT! First off - it does not leave a greasy feel on your hands or your body and secondly, it smells amazing - not over powering, but clean and fresh. I have given all of my other hand and body lotions away because I love the Cody Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion!!!

customer_reviews.title: Subtle Scent and Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion because it has a very subtle scent, not perfumy at all. I live in Arizona and my skin can dry out easily. I use this everyday and my skin looks Great!

customer_reviews.title: The good scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people who prefer fragrance-free products and can't stand overly perfumed creams and makeup. But this lotion's scent is the exception. It's refreshing and lifts my mood...for a while. I bought a two-pack this last time.
